Name: Bar Mowgli
Review Text: Good: Nice interior, tasty food, english menus, Brand beer; Bad: food is somewhat pricy for that amount, service is a little bit slow, only one kind of Brand beer ;)

Name: Bar Mowgli
Review Text: Different to the standard Dutch bistro menu which is nice for a change. Friendly people working there, who showed me a new drink I hadn't had before. They have several types of cider, quite sweet. Really liked how it was decorated. Very relaxed and not too loud.lots of space between tables.

Name: Bar Mowgli
Review Text: Food is excellent, good taste and presented well. Must try the ribs, they are special! Service is great. Atmosphere cosy. Overall, a great place and one of the best in the area!

Name: Bar Mowgli
Review Text: Average to disgusting food and bad service. The staff was busy with themselves and each other so took ages before the food arrived. When we finally got our food everything was cold and overcocked. The staff even had the audacity to ask for ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice bar and nice lunch. Cozy inside and a nice atmosphere. The tomato soup with bell pepper was spicy and I think this was a mistake. Fortunately we can withstand spicy food. ‚Ä¶
